attributes.action: Hold Israeli police accountable for brutally attacking a UK citizen unjustly
attributes.additional_details:
The Al Aqsa Mosque is the third holiest site in the world in Islam. The last 10 days of Ramadhan is a particularly auspicious occasion for Muslims across the world. No pilgrim, let alone a UK citizen,  deserves to be attacked and dealt with such force, as seen below:

https://mobile.twitter.com/palinfoen/status/746958784786882561?s=08

https://twitter.com/palinfoen/status/747007202255220739
attributes.background: On 26th June, 2016 during the last 10 days of Ramadhan, Israeli Police stormed the Al Aqsa Mosque, and brutally attacked a UK citizen. He was not involved in any provocation. We, the undersigned, request the UK government to protect the human rights of UK citizens abroad.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to raise this matter with the government of Israel.
